title: Replace hero section image with uploaded Fish Edit image

requirements.text: Replace the current hero section logo image with the uploaded 'Fish Edit.png' image in the Home page component

quotes: can you replace the image in the hero with this image instead?

acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded Fish Edit.png image appears in the hero section of the Home page
The image maintains proper responsive sizing and positioning within the hero layout
The existing flag motifs and other hero elements remain unchanged

constraints: Preserve the existing hero section layout structure with flag motifs
nonGoals: Changing any other images on the site
Modifying the hero section layout or structure
